sub_title: Sworn Translator, Court Interpreter, Copywriter & Subtitler | Dutch <> English & Croatian/Serbian/Bosnian/Montenegrin | Legal and Marketing Translation | Freelance Writing | Active Digital Nomad |
summary:
Hallo! I am Emma, a Dutch sworn translator, court interpreter, copywriter, and subtitler who's here to help you optimize your content by creating a certified, clear, and compelling message to the Dutch audience.

Being raised bilingual, I truly believe that language details matter as they ultimately decide the type of impression a message leaves. Through small changes, I can make considerable alterations in meaning.

That's why I offer you certified translation, subtitling, copywriting, and interpretation services in Dutch, English, Croatian, Serbian, Bosnian, and Montenegrin. 

My language combinations are:
- English <> Dutch
- Dutch <> Croatian
- Dutch <> Serbian
- Dutch <> Bosnian
- Dutch <> Montenegrin

Why choose me?
‚Ä¢ Fully certified according to the Dutch Sworn Interpreters and Translators Act
‚Ä¢ Been working in the industry for more than 5 years
‚Ä¢ Founder of the translation agency Sempre Verba Translations 
‚Ä¢ Copywriting and content writing skills

Specializations:
‚Ä¢ Legal translation 
‚Ä¢ Marketing
‚Ä¢ Literature
‚Ä¢ Sustainability
‚Ä¢ And more

Please feel free to get in touch with me:
‚úâÔ∏è sempreverba@gmail.com
‚òéÔ∏è +31 (0)622015340
üíª www.sempreverba.com
